Articles.Content: I want to be able to have Rovers and Kerbals "Follow the Leader" like in this mod. It would aid in transport of many Kerbals in the event that a Rover breaks down, or for a convoy of rovers. Ships burning together is a little too Autopilot-y, so ships following would not be implemented.

there has been attempts at this for kerbals but not rovers such as the mod EVA Followers although it is pretty much dead now...

you can probably retool the code since its license allows for it
